settings.title: Settings
settings.defaultTermsPlaceholder: Enter your standard terms and conditions that will be pre-filled on all new estimates...
settings.defaultTermsHelp: These terms will automatically populate on new estimates. You can always edit them on individual estimates.
settings.logoHelp: PNG, JPG up to 2MB. Logo will appear on estimates and in header.
settings.calendarRemindersDesc: Get notified about calendar events and deadlines

finance.subtitle: Track expenses, revenue, and manage your finances

calculator.title: Pricing Calculator
calculator.subtitle: Get accurate, AI-powered pricing estimates for your construction projects
calculator.selectTradeDescription: Choose from 20+ trades to get accurate, AI-powered pricing for your project. We'll analyze current material and labor costs to provide you with detailed estimates.
calculator.aiAnalyzing: Our AI is analyzing current material and labor costs for your project...
calculator.fillSpecifications: Fill in the project specifications and click "Calculate Pricing" to get your detailed estimate.

calendar.title: Project Calendar
calendar.subtitle: Manage your project schedules and deadlines

subscriptions.title: Subscription Plans
subscriptions.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your business. All plans include our core features with different levels of functionality.
subscriptions.currentlySubscribed: You are currently subscribed to this plan
subscriptions.needHelpDescription: Have questions about our pricing or need a custom solution? We're here to help.
subscriptions.guaranteeDescription: Try our service risk-free. If you're not completely satisfied, get a full refund.
subscriptions.securePaymentsDescription: All transactions are secured with 256-bit SSL encryption powered by Stripe.
subscriptions.support247Description: Get help whenever you need it from our dedicated support team.
subscriptions.selectPerfectPlan: Select the perfect plan for your contracting business
subscriptions.cancelConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? You will still have access until the end of your current billing period.
subscriptions.cancelSuccess: Your subscription has been cancelled. You will still have access until the end of your current billing period.
subscriptions.turnOffAutoRenewalConfirm: Turn off auto-renewal? You will still have access until the end of your current billing period.
